1.text: Order a Nespresso recycling bag with your next shipment.

2.text: Find a nearby collection point by using Nespresso’s recycling map.

3.text: Fill your bag with used pods and close it when it’s full.

4.text: Place your pods in the container or drop them off at the customer service desk.

5.text: Locate a nearby UPS or Nespresso store.

6.text: Call a UPS or Nespresso store to find out if and how they collect pods.

7.text: Take your used pods to the location in the container they specified.

8.text: Drop your used pods off with an employee to get them recycled.

9.text: Order a Nespresso recycling bag with your next order.

10.text: Place another order for Nespresso pods and a recycling bag when you’re running low.

11.text: Give your recycling bag to the delivery driver when he shows up.

12.text: Remove the cap and clean a used pod by rinsing it in cold water.

13.text: Use scissors to cut a circular cover out of aluminum foil.

14.text: Fill your pod with grounds and leave 1 millimeter of space at the top.

15.text: Place the foil over your pod and wrap it under the lip.

16.text: Use your refilled pod the same way that you would use a normal pod.
